project.description: Reads index-records and indexes into SOLR

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: datasetId
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The datasetId e.g. dr893. To run for all data run with 'all'. Use a space separated list to provide a number of datasets e.g. dr123 d124

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ "$datasetId" = "all" ] ; then curl -X GET "http://aws-solrcloud-quoll-1.ala:8983/solr/admin/collections?action=DELETE&name=biocache" curl -X GET "http://aws-solrcloud-quoll-1.ala:8983/solr/admin/collections?action=CREATE&name=biocache&numShards=8&maxShardsPerNode=1&replicationFactor=1&collection.configName=biocache" fi
if [ "$includeSampling" = true ] ; then sudo -u spark la-pipelines solr $datasetId $mode --extra-args="includeSampling=true" else sudo -u spark la-pipelines solr $datasetId $mode --extra-args="includeSampling=false" fi
